"A smart vacuum cleaner that learns your cleaning habits and optimizes its schedule for maximum efficiency."
"A vacuum cleaner with built-in sensors that can detect and remove allergens and other harmful particles from your home."
"A vacuum cleaner with a modular design that allows you to easily swap out different attachments for a variety of cleaning tasks."
"A vacuum cleaner with a self-cleaning brush roll that prevents dirt and debris from getting tangled and clogging the roll."
